description: PDC_APP_ORIG_SYS_XREF Reference key to accounts id of legacy system and it is used for converting accounts from other system
PDC_STATUS_CD PDC status like OPEN PROCESSED VOID
PDC_ACCOUNT_TYPE_CD PDC account type like SAVINGS CHECKING
PDC_DOCKET_CODE Docket code where the cheques are physically placed by the lending institution
PDC_TYPE_CD PDC purpose like SECURITY PAYMENT
